attributes.action: e-petitions to have an option to vote against the proposition
attributes.additional_details:
In order to identify the support FOR or AGAINST a petition, add the option to vote against the proposition.

If at any time within the permitted signing period an e-petition gains 100,000 more votes in favour than against then the proposition should be debated, but if there are 100,000 more votes against than in favour then the e-petition should be rejected and closed.
